body.p: Here are some examples of GNOME running on FreeBSD. Click on the thumbnails below to see a larger image.

p.b: A GNOME 3.16 Desktop showing off the Gimp, vlc, chromium
A GNOME 2.24 Desktop showing off the Gimp, the System Monitor applet, and the multi-byte, fully internationalized power of GNOME.
p.i: Contributed by Denise H. G. <darcsis |at| gmail.com>

p.b: GNOME 2.24 within GNOME 2.24! This is a GNOME 2.24 Desktop running vinagre connected to another GNOME 2.24 Desktop running Epiphany. The main desktop is also sporting the Anjuta IDE, the new Empathy IM client, and showing off the SMB network browsing capability along with the internationalized clock applet.
p.i: Contributed by Joe Marcus Clarke <marcus |at| FreeBSD.org>
